text: On July 11, 2023, Manang Air's Airbus Helicopters H125 was supposed to travel from Surke, Solukhumbu to Kathmandu. The aircraft left Solukhumbu at 10:05 a.m. local time. It lost contact less than 10 minutes later. It was later found crashed in Chihandanda of Lamjura in Likhupike, Solukhumbu, Nepal. The crash was caused by bad weather. ==References== Category:July 2023 events Category:2023 disasters in Asia Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in 2023 Category:2023 in Nepal Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in Asia
title: 2023 Manang Air helicopter crash
